item.title: The Best Anime of All Time
item.description: Introduction This data comes from My Anime List, courtesy of TidyTuesday. Here’s the excerpt from the site: “MyAnimeList, often abbreviated as MAL, is an anime and manga social networking and social cataloging application website. The site provides its users with a list-like system to organize and score anime and manga. It facilitates finding users who share similar tastes and provides a large database on anime and manga. The site claims to have 4.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Stay tuned! This is the first post of my blog! Here I will discuss my adventures into the world of Data Science and R.
